mapper.select: SELECT A.SITE_CODE, '(' || A.SITE_CODE || ') ' || A.SITE_NAME AS SITE_NAME, A.SITE_COMMYN, MAX(INFO_CHSU) CFM_CHSU FROM TCT_SITE A, TBG_INFO B WHERE A.SITE_OFFICE = '01' AND A.SITE_USEYN = '1' AND B.INFO_COMP(+) = '1' AND A.SITE_OFFICE = B.INFO_OFFICE(+) AND A.SITE_CODE = B.INFO_SITE(+) AND SITE_CODE IN ( SELECT AVBUJ_CD FROM SYTB0110 WHERE USERS_ID = 'admin' AND GUNHA_EQ = '1' UNION ALL SELECT SITE_CODE FROM TCT_SITE WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SYTB0110 WHERE USERS_ID = 'admin' AND GUNHA_EQ = '1' AND AVBUJ_CD = '*****') ) GROUP BY A.SITE_CODE, A.SITE_NAME, A.SITE_COMMYN
SELECT INFO_CHSU CHSU, INFO_CHSU || 'ì°¨' CHASU, INFO_COMP COMP, INFO_APPFILE, INFO_FILEPATH FROM TBG_INFO WHERE INFO_OFFICE = '01' AND INFO_SITE = #{SITE_CODE} ORDER BY CHSU DESC
SELECT GUBU_CODE, GUBU_CODE || '. ' || GUBU_NAME GUBU_NAME, GUBU_GBN FROM TBG_GUBU ORDER BY GUBU_CODE
